name: CLBeacon
desc: Information about an observed iBeacon device and its relative distance to the userâ€™s device.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: The UUID that the observed beacon transmitted.

items.name: var major: NSNumber
items.desc: The major value that the observed beacon transmitted.

items.name: var minor: NSNumber
items.desc: The minor value that the observed beacon transmitted.

items.name: var proximity: CLProximity
items.desc: The relative distance to the beacon.

items.name: enum CLProximity
items.desc: Constants that reflect the relative distance to a beacon.

items.name: var accuracy: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of the proximity value, measured in meters from the beacon.

items.name: var rssi: Int
items.desc: The received signal strength of the beacon, measured in decibels.

items.name: var timestamp: Date
items.desc: A timestamp representing when the beacon was observed.
